author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The purpose of this PR is to introduce a generalized abstraction for Strip Payload inspector `SiStripCondObjectRepresent` and use it to make detailed comparison and correlation plots for the Strip payload inspector.

#### PR validation:

Relies on augmented unit tests and extended private validation. 
Example of plots obtainable with the new additions.

   * Strip Noise:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/158883860-1f02b8d1-3862-44d0-98b3-a329f590af3e.png)

   * Strip Pedestals:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/158883902-bcc3ce65-4676-46d6-b68f-a3e8c426af8c.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Introduce generalized abstraction for Strip Payload Inspector
